steps.step: Weigh out 30g of whole bean coffee
Grind coffee beans to medium consistency
Insert a paper filter into your AeroPress filter basket
Dump the coffee grounds into the filter basket and place the AeroPress on your favorite mug
Pour the heated water into the brewing chamber up to the ② marker
Brew for 15 seconds...no more, no less
Stir the coffee with a spoon or coffee stirrer
Insert plunger and press down until the plunger reaches the coffee grounds
Add more hot water and half and half to taste
Enjoy sipping on your freshly brewed AeroPress coffee
